document.full_text: nflpa spokesman george atallah said tuesday that the group will not ask incoming rookies to avoid the april 28-30 nfl draft.
document.title: nflpa claims it's not asking players to 'boycott' draft
lines_and_colors: nflpa spokesman george atallah said tuesday that the group will not ask incoming rookies to avoid the april 28-30 nfl draft.
